definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: Are welcome to waste materials business unit and individual calls business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎有廢舊物資的企業單位及個人來電洽談業務。

sentences.english: Waste plastics is a kind of recoverable resources.
sentences.chinese: 廢舊塑料是一種可以回收利用的資源。

sentences.english: From here tones of mixed batteries are passed on to a special sorting plant.
sentences.chinese: 混合的廢舊電池要經過一個特殊的分檢設備。

sentences.english: Please deal with waste battery according to the local rule.
sentences.chinese: 依據使用當地的法規處理廢舊電池。

sentences.english: This thesis states that it is important to pay attention to waste cells and environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了對廢舊電池和環境保護問題關注的重要性。

sentences.english: Metal scrap can be melted down and reused.
sentences.chinese: 廢舊金屬可以熔化後再使用。

sentences.english: The cost of the modified asphalt decrease if the road asphalt will be modified with microwave irradiation waste rubber powder.
sentences.chinese: 用微波復照廢舊橡膠粉改性瀝青，可以降低其成本。

sentences.english: She says she was influenced to make baskets using waste materials.
sentences.chinese: 她說，她是用籃子的影響，使廢舊物資。

sentences.english: China abandons platform of the information on country of net of old goods and materials' biggest network.
sentences.chinese: 中國廢舊物資網國內最大的一個網上信息平臺。

sentences.english: Recycling methods and treatment technology of waste plastics were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 廢舊塑料通常以填埋或焚燒的方式處理。

sentences.english: A good deal of attention has been paid to the pollution of waste dry cell.
sentences.chinese: 廢舊電池的污染已引起人們的廣泛關注。

sentences.english: Present situation of waste plastic reuse and its development were described.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了廢舊塑料回收利用情況及發展前景。

sentences.english: In the light of their features, these mines and shells have been destroyed by use of a blasting method.
sentences.chinese: 針對這些廢舊雷彈的特點，採用爆破方法將它們銷燬。

sentences.english: The Company is a specialized production and acquisition of the scrap metal business.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家專門收購生產性廢舊金屬的企業。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the reclaim of waste cells.
sentences.chinese: 分析了我國廢舊電池的回收利用現狀。
